metadata.title: CVE-2023-22799 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A ReDoS based DoS vulnerability in the GlobalID <1.0.1 which could allow anattacker supplying a carefully crafted input can cause the regularexpression engine to take an unexpected amount of time. All users runningan affected release should either upgrade or use one of the workaroundsimmediately.

criterions.comment: ruby-globalid: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
